Achievements.DRYYA_ACH_DESC: Defeat Dryya in her Queen's Garden.
Achievements.HEG_ACH_DESC: Defeat Hegemol in the bustling City.
Achievements.ZEM_ACH_DESC: Defeat Ze'mer in her secret Mansion.
Achievements.PANTH_ACH_DESC: Challenge the Pale Court and win your place at its heart.

CP3.ISMA_LOCKED_DESC: I lie in a lush grove, defended by my beloved
CP3.DRYYA_LOCKED_DESC: I defend true royalty from the claws of traitors
CP3.HEG_LOCKED_DESC: I stand guard at the gates of the capital
CP3.ZEM_LOCKED_DESC: My blade rests amongst hidden graves and forgotten dreams

Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_1: Welcome back! I'm afraid I cannot greet you properly at the moment, lest I disrupt my partner here.
Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_2: We've finished our sculptures of the five Great Knights, and I'm quite pleased with the results. My partner wanted something more though, and that's how I ended up in this position.
Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_3: To be the subject of a sculpture rather than the sculptor is a new feeling! I quite like it.
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_1: Ah, so you've returned, at a perfect moment too! Inspired by how our models turned out, I've decided on a more ambitious piece yet.
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_2: Feel free to view our work. On a whim we decided to sculpt one of you as well; though small in stature, you fit nicely in their midst.
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_3: With the building of the Kingdom's Knights finished, my claws yearn to capture something more...
Minor NPC.WL_KH_1: ...That scent. Does another travel with you? Is that you Ogrim, Isma, my mighty Knights? Your smell is much more potent when together.<page>Loyalty and kindness: precious qualities forgotten in these trying times. You've surely seen it in your trek here, of untended thorns and blinded intruders.<page>Is this why you both stay silent upon me? Isma, you'll surely understand the weary state of a plant life under such ailment, only worsened with responsibility and regret.<page>Your presence is a pleasing relief from my faded body, recollecting dear memories from so far away now. I'm grateful for your visit.
Minor NPC.WL_KH_2: On your leave, if you didn't already, do me a favour and bid your goodbyes to Dryya.<page>However crude she may have sounded in your regards, Isma, she holds you both dear like the rest of the Knights. I'm sure Ogrim is aware of this.
Minor NPC.WL_MP_1: So you're finally back, Dryya. Retire, please, and allow me to medicate your wounds; your Lady isn't completely helpless yet.<page>Do not protest, do not feel threatened. My roots sense no more danger; I assure you the lord of traitors is gone.<page>I've heard the valiant fights above, then their full silence. Victorious and vigilant, are you not, Dryya?<page>You did well, my knight, so well. Breathe, sit here for a while; I'll take care of the rest, may the need arise.
Minor NPC.WL_MP_2: I would urge you to sit here, but I cannot deny your will. Do as you see fit, no judgement upon you. Reckon this refuge may be yours as well.<page>May your mind be sharp and your nail swift. Be cautious.
Minor NPC.WL_BH_1: I won't query how you've reached this room with a shape so large, yet your presence I plainly feel, my knight Hegemol.<page>If your visit is to inform me of the enduring perils, I am aware, as my roots sense the plague spreading again. No power have I to prevent its proliferation.<page>Having bound myself to this position I'm grateful you've reached out. Yours is a presence I wasn't conscious of missing, however quieter your voice is here.<page>I entrust you with the citizens and their future. Keep the city secure under your shadow. Do what you must.
Minor NPC.WL_BH_2: Before you leave, one last task for you: tell Dryya to rest.<page>She's been forever obliging her duties and never granted herself any peace from the plagued. Surely she will heed the words of a dear friend.
Minor NPC.WL_VL_1: ...So it was your lament that my roots registered. Though shrouded in sorrow, I'm glad to sense you again my knight, Ze'mer.<page>No dear bloom of yours I sense; you've brought it to your fallen beloved then? Her grave must be well-tended.<page>What brings you to this refuge? Surely you've seen the battlefield above us, carcasses gathered in bushes.<page>...Nothing I have can soothe your great loss, but I won't reject your will if you so wish to spend a little while here.
Minor NPC.WL_VL_2: I'm grateful for your presence, however brief; none could have predicted such a visit.<page>Dryya is still stationed at the entrance, so there won't be enemies on your way out of this haven. However, stay vigilant in the gardens.
Minor NPC.WL_ALL_1: ...Is it real? Yet so many guests but so much emptiness around. Is my outgrowth deceiving my perception of the surroundings? Or have you all always been this minute?<page>Understand my scepticism, dear Five: I'm capable of seeing only through other means and these in dire times would've never predicted the Great Knights' gathering. Weren't for your faint presence I sense; I would've thought my mind completely gone.<page>Your arrival brings back joyful memories of merrier times, from legendary tales to ordinary patrols... You surely miss those moments like any bug surviving now. I long for them as well.<page>Still, in your mute state, it is a relief knowing you're following your tasks under such duress. This kingdom is thankful to have protectors like yourselves.
Minor NPC.WL_ALL_2: Is your silence caused by my presence? Be aware no duty obligates you to stay, for I have no title. If you prefer to leave and discuss with the others, do so with no need of my order.<page>Either way, you're always welcome here. I won't disturb your reunion or rest.

Zote.SHEO_DREAM: To be here with him... it soothes my soul...
Zote.SMITH_DREAM: ...So long as I'm not alone... it matters not...

Speech.ISMA_DESC: Gentle god of moss and grove
Speech.DD_ISMA_DESC: Loyal defender gods of honour and care
Speech.DRYYA_DESC: Protective god of Root and King
Speech.HEG_DESC: Immovable god of the kingdom's heart
Speech.ZEM2_DESC: Strange god of a sacred land
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_1: Dryya... Despite your stoic demeanour, this loyalty to our Queen... It was genuine care, was it not...?
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_2: Hegemol... Despite your bulky carapace and imposing name, how gentle your voice used to echo...
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_3: Ze'mer... Despite your skill and strength, you only wished to put your nail down, did you not...?
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_4: Oh, Ogrim... If only we had had more time...
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_5: How joyous it is to see you again, little knight. You know, however preoccupied and detached he may have been, our Monarch always cared for you. Perhaps, he'll show it one day...
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_1: Hegemol... Do you still stand guard, forever loyal to the capital's citizens...?
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_2: Ogrim, Isma... Was it strength you found in each other, or was it weakness...?
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_3: Ze'mer... To put down your nail, not despite, but because of your will...
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_4: My Queen... why do we hide when we are needed most? What of your subjects?
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_5: How elating it is to meet once more, little knight. The dignity you carry yourself with is one I've only seen in our King. Perhaps some day the royal family will be whole once again, and you may join us as an equal.
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_1: Ogrim... After all that has happened, do you hope still...?
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_2: Isma... Are your vines now as tough as I recall them? Please, take care of yourself and Ogrim...
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_3: Dryya... Protect our Queen and yourself at all costs! I don't know how much longer I can continue here...
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_4: Ze'mer... Don't let your sorrow get the better of you, not even after your great loss!
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_5: Oh, so I meet you once again, little one. My fortitude is wearing out now, but we and the King trained your endurance well... Do what you must, please. Anything to save Hallownest.
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_1: Ogrim... Why do you persist in your restless duty, if only for a wilting domain?
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_2: Isma... Is your rest peaceful, in your grove so dear...?
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_3: Dryya... Do you still guard against overgrown thorns and vicious claws? Will you ever lie your blade down?
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_4: Hegemol... You still endure it under unending tears? Che' hopes you may also, perhaps, rest one day...
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_5: Ulll, Le'mer, to see you return. So much pain in so brief a time expired our Monarch's will, but Le'mer? Upon Le'mer is a rare strength, a duty for a lifetime. Meled'lover, wait for me...
Speech.CC_OUTRO_1a: Vessel, your training will greatly serve our dear Kingdom of Hallownest. Vessel, bind the formless enemy in their dreams.
Speech.CC_OUTRO_1b: Such sacrifice will be known throughout all Hallownest. Champion of the Court, You are the Vessel. You are the Hollow Knight.

Enemy Dreams.OGRIM_GG_DREAM_1: My King... I believe in you. I believe in Hallownest!
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_DREAM_2: To enter my grove and withstand acid blight...
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_DREAM_3: Ogrim... If only we could spend a little while longer training here...
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_GG_DREAM_1: A vine here, a vine there...
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_GG_DREAM_2: You're a tough one, but my plants are tougher!
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_GG_DREAM_3: Let's see how much you can endure!
Enemy Dreams.DRYYA_DREAM_2: My Queen... I will protect you...
Enemy Dreams.HEG_DREAM_1: How to protect against a plague of mind...?
Enemy Dreams.HEG_DREAM_2: I'll fight to defend the City!
Enemy Dreams.HEG_DREAM_3: It bears the crest, but is it worthy?
Enemy Dreams.HEG_GG_DREAM_1: Is that all you've got, little one?
Enemy Dreams.HEG_GG_DREAM_2: Show me what you're made of!
Enemy Dreams.HEG_GG_DREAM_3: Prove to me you're a champion!
Enemy Dreams.HEG_GG_DREAM_4: Keep fighting! A warrior never gives up!
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_DREAM_2: Ulll... A new enemy of Nou's love?
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_DREAM_3: Nemenoo... Nails and claws... Why must it be so?
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_GG_DREAM_3: Perhaps Nou'll sooner rest than later...
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_CC_DREAM_1: Show che' Le'mer can bear this burden!
Enemy Dreams.TISO_DREAM_1: So it really is up for the challenge...

UI.CHARM_DESC_PURITY:
The Vessel was gifted a Pure Nail forged through arcane means as a reflection of itself. This Charm embodies the echoes of that ancient craftsmanship.

Hold ATTACK to concentrate and swing the nail in a frenzy. Gradually increases the bearer's rate of attack as they land nail strikes in quick succession.
UI.CHARM_DESC_LAMENT:
Contains the hardships and grievances forced upon the chained Vessel. Energy desperately seeps out from within the constraints.

Focus to twist the SOUL of enemies marked by the nail and unleash devastating blasts of energy upon them.
UI.CHARM_DESC_BOON:
The Pale Wyrm's beacon shines brightly through this Charm. The blessing bestowed upon the land known as Hallownest was able to elevate the lesser bugs that resided in the domain.

Transforms all spells to take on a purified form.
UI.CHARM_DESC_BLOOM:
A dark blossom that was cursed to restrain an uncontrollable power. Even though the darkness within may be repressed, it writhes in a volatile manner threatening to break free.

The bearer gains overwhelming power as they draw nearer to death.
UI.CHARM_DESC_HONOUR:
Unique charm bestowed by the King to his most loyal knight. Refurbished and restored to its original state.

Surrounds the bearer in a royal and heroic aura.

Journal.ENTRY_ISMA_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Protected the King and watched over the grove where she would eventually rest.
Journal.ENTRY_ISMA_NOTE:
"Ah, Isma... where do I begin? Your kindness had no bounds; even in battle I could sense your sorrow for our fallen foes. While my oath forbids it, I ought to pay you a visit... someday..."
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_DRYYA_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Protected the Queen in her gardens and fought vigilantly against the mantis traitors when the Infection spread.
Journal.ENTRY_DRYYA_NOTE:
"Dryya, your fierceness in combat was one of a kind! It was almost like watching an elegant dance when you confronted the kingdom's foes. While you put on a hard front, I'm thankful I was among the few you'd call friend."
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_HEG_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Stood guard at the city until its fall. A statue now stands in his place.
Journal.ENTRY_HEG_NOTE:
"I can still hear your jolly chortle, Hegemol. For such a towering bug, you were so quiet! But your humour was simply unrivalled. After all this time, I never got to see your face... What were you hiding behind that armour, dear friend?"
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_ZEM_DESC: Champion from a brighter age. Served the kingdom at its height, but retreated to her mansion when it fell to ruin.
Journal.ENTRY_ZEM_NOTE:
"Ze'mer... what a fascinating ally you were. Your stories that so enraptured us were incredible. Perhaps, you would take me to see your home one day? I would like that very much. To see the worlds beyond."
- Ogrim of the Five Knights
Journal.ENTRY_TISO_DESC: A traveller seeking brutal combat, last fallen in the Colosseum. Fights with a unique shield.
Journal.ENTRY_TISO_NOTE: An arena of planned dangers and senseless spectacle... I don't understand this Colosseum's appeal. Do they not grasp the allure of true hunting? Is it the audience's presence that drives them so? Or is there a power beyond calling them to fruitless combat?

PC Contributor Tablets.INTRO:
Bear witness to the power of a group united in mysterious cause.
With this great feat finished, they may now rest.
PC Contributor Tablets.AZEROD:
May Pale Court remain as one of the signs of how far hollow knight modding went.
- Azerod (Writing, Translation)
PC Contributor Tablets.HELENSB:
Until Silksong graces us with its release, have fun with all the amazing content this talented community keeps creating!
You are all incredibly creative and I am thankful for all the great mods out there.
Disfrutad de todo el contenido que esta comunidad llena de talento ha realizado hasta que Silksong nos honre con su lanzamiento. Vuestra creatividad no tiene límites.
¡Gracias por todos los mods que habéis creado!
- HelenSB (Translation, Playtesting)
PC Contributor Tablets.REDFROG:
I'm glad we're finally releasing! Around the end there I really thought it wasn't Silksong we were working on, but it was some mod for Hollow Knight.
- Redfrog (Programming)
PC Contributor Tablets.MULHIMA:
This mod is a rip off of pail curt
- Mulhima (Playtesting, Programming)
PC Contributor Tablets.CHAKTIS:
Here's where I'd put the tram copypasta... if I could fit it
- Chaktis (Art)
PC Contributor Tablets.CRANKYTEMPLAR:
It's kind of crazy to see how far things have come. A big congrats to the team!
- CrankyTemplar (Playtesting)
PC Contributor Tablets.ERIE:
hype mod. thank god people were willing to work on this for so long, and with it finally being available, everyone can appreciate the years of hard work that went into this from so many people.
- Erie (Playtesting)
PC Contributor Tablets.FOLDINGPAPERS:
"Yet to no avail - that part of my memory blurs in my mind like a fresh painted canvas left out in a thunderstorm"
- FoldingPapers (Music)
PC Contributor Tablets.GAUTHIER:
What a journey, this is a very special mod for a very special community. See you for Pale Silk in 10 years.
- Gauthier (Music)
PC Contributor Tablets.HOOKNOWS:
I'm truly grateful to have been a part of this incredible project. Still hard to believe that 4 years ago, I struggled to even set up Visual Studio for modding, but now here I am, somehow being a part of all this cool stuff.
Thanks for playing, it means a lot to all of us.
- HooKnows (Programming)
PC Contributor Tablets.HUNTHUSSLE:
ROCK AND STONE. Thanks to zaliant for letting me playtest this great mod!
- HuntHussle (Playtesting)
PC Contributor Tablets.JOSEBACH:
Mamma mamma, guarda: sono in tivù! Per me è stato un grandissimo onore aver contribuito a questo progetto, per quanto io sia tra gli ultimi arrivati.
Spero di aver dato veramente il massimo tra playtesting, testi e traduzione perché, cazzo, i Cinque Grandi Cavalieri e noi ce lo meritiamo! Grazie per tutte le risate, sudate, incazzature e le notti insonni che abbiamo trascorso insieme.
You're fantastic and determined and truly inspiring (and I'm positive I won't be the only one thinking that). Vi voglio un sacco bene e sono così tanto fiera di voi e di tutti noi, non potete immaginare.
In bocca al lupo e in culo alla balena, statemi bene. Un abbraccio, Ada- Ah, emh, jsb
- JoSeBach (Writing, Translation)
PC Contributor Tablets.KNIGHTMERE:
It's been wonderful working on something with you all. Even though my activity in HK's community isn't what it used to be, I'm very happy to see this project flourish and be a part of it.
Also hi zaliant.
- Knightmere (Playtesting)
PC Contributor Tablets.MANNO STONE:
It was spectacular! A battle like no other, it was very well balanced! Well... Until it started... So remember: "Hesitation is defeat".
Where did I hear that?
Achou que eu ia escrever algo legal? Achou errado! E digo mais, vocês não podem errar porque errar é "o Manno"!
- Manno Stone (Writing, Translation)
PC Contributor Tablets.RIVERROBOT:
"A temple buried, a forgotten doom... The darkness writhes, contained, controlled... To protect, to restrain... A wrathful Bloom..."
- RiverRobot (Programming)
PC Contributor Tablets.ROCKETFIRE20:
Thank you all for the laughs, the highs and the lows, the heartwarming moments, and the fun. Most importantly, thank you Emu, for introducing me to this game. I owe this all to you.
I cannot express how much I respect and appreciate you all for the hard work to get this mod out after so long. Now, I can't wait to see what Silksong has to offer, what secrets it holds and what heights we can bring it to.
See you all then!
- RocketFire20 (Playtesting)
PC Contributor Tablets.SFGRENADE:
With the mod complete, what next challenges await? What will we strive towards? Will we wander the heights of Pharloom? The depths of the Abyss?
Time will tell, and time we took for this mod to be polished for you. Have fun with the Pale Court!
- SFGrenade (Programming)
PC Contributor Tablets.SOVEREIGNELISE:
Ze'mer and her beloved, may you rest well. Such a pleasure to voice my favorite of the Great Knights. As a lesbian, this little bit of representation means everything.
And I hope any other queer women that play this mod enjoy Ze'mer as much as I do.
- SovereignElise (Voicing)
PC Contributor Tablets.ROTTEN LEGACY:
People have this glow about them when they're doing something they believe in, you know? They leave their mark on the world and make it a brighter place, like stars against a backdrop of darkness. This team is an example of that, as are you, dear reader.
I hope you have a lovely day!
- Rotten Legacy (Voicing)
PC Contributor Tablets.MOSSBAG:
Five Great Knights at Freddy's. Think about it.
- mossbag (Voicing)
PC Contributor Tablets.SARART:
i've only gotten involved in this project towards the end, but i really felt like part of the team, hope you enjoy it!
- Sarart (Voicing)
PC Contributor Tablets.MEBI:
almost can't believe we made it, my expectations exceeded tenfold
- MEBI (Art)
PC Contributor Tablets.SALEH:
See you in the abyss expansion... actually I'll just wait for Silksong
- Saleh (Programming)
PC Contributor Tablets.KITSUNEMEDIA:
if we had more development time there would've an area with catgirls
- KitsuneMedia (Art)
PC Contributor Tablets.CLAZEX:
To the people who enjoy the world of Hollow Knight like me, hope you enjoy what Pale Court adds to it! I'm so proud that I've really become a part of this.
- Clazex (Programming)

Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_1_1: Little one! How nice to see you in these hallowed halls as a friend. Our sparring was truly enjoyable, but I do tire of it sometimes.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_1_2: Yet, fighting you alongside Isma was a wonderful experience. We've worked on our techniques for some time now, and it was nice to try them against a new foe.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_1_3: And you dodged them admirably! Fair warning friend: next time we won't make it any easier, haha!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_2_1: Strong, swift, and analytical; watching Isma fighting is like witnessing a force of nature, is it not?
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_2_2: I'm sure you've been impressed yourself like everyone here! Plants commanded at will is not a thing you see ordinarily, let alone in battle. What wit and skill must be needed to manage such a thing...
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_2_3: I may... admire her more than I should, but none can state her strength is not impressive to behold! Through her kindness, we've learned much together, and that is the source of our synergy!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_REPEAT: Have some rest now, you deserve it! Feel free to talk to the others in the meantime.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_FIRST_DREAM: Such strength... You are quite the curious fellow, little knight.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_1_1: It's so refreshing to battle for the sake of teaching in these dire times, especially in an arena that allows room for creativity. What a blessing to be able to express our finest styles like this, really.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_1_2: What would this trial be without dung to dive into, soil to grow on? And with civilians in danger from Hegemol's blows? Certainly not a good prospect, especially after that incident in the capital...
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_1_3: At least only the architecture suffered lasting damage.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_2_1: Have you seen the gardens hidden here? Our Queen has grown several of them in the palace grounds, behind pale halls and pristine rooms. It's the perfect place to ease your nerves after a trying shift.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_2_2: Isma told me she would love to create her own garden in her place. I wonder if the plants will survive with the very little light that comes through the waterways' pipes.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_2_3: If they do, though, I would love to have some myself! She could teach me how to take care of them!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_SECOND_REPEAT: Either way, you seem to be learning fast. With such pace you'll surpass everyone in no time!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_THIRD_1_1: Your skills are astounding! It's a luck you're on our side, or it would've been trouble for us.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_THIRD_1_2: I can't wait to see you again in battle!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_THIRD_REPEAT: I can't wait to see you again in battle!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_THIRD_DREAM: The King was right, it will save Hallownest...
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_CHARM_1: So, you bear my gift! Its loyal aura suits you so nicely that I thought it was your own heroic aroma!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_CHARM_2: This is a charm created with much care and caution, bestowed to me by our dear King as I've proven my loyalty to Him.
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_CHARM_3: Your skill and honour have proven you worthy to wear my crest. It will serve you well, you have my esteem, friend!
Reward Room.RR_OGRIM_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors on these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_1_1: Ahh, so wonderful to talk with the mysterious little knight at last! I've not seen many who have this skill at wielding a nail. Besides our Dryya, of course!
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_1_2: Was it the King who trained you? I've not seen our Liege ever hold a weapon, but his prowess in combat really must be great to have helped Him form a Kingdom so wondrous.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_1_3: I wonder what thought came to that red warrior's mind to so foolishly attempt the life of a wyrm...? I feel sorry for that dead traitor.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_2_1: Seeing Ogrim duelling with you, I just had to jump in before my proper turn! Apologies if I caused a scare!
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_2_2: You seemed like a fun opponent to fight against! And we'd been itching to try out our special technique, anyway. Nothing quite like fighting with your... friend.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_2_3: Not that anything is happening between Ogrim and I. No, nothing at all. You mustn't worry about these trivial matters. Focus on your training instead! I understand you've a role to fulfil in our kingdom.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_REPEAT: Now go! It wouldn't do to keep you to myself when I'm sure the others would love to talk.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_FIRST_DREAM: A curious one, to be certain... What secrets did the King keep to raise such strength...?
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_1_1: You seem to have grown more accustomed to our movements, especially in an arena so unconventional.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_1_2: Fighting is even more fun in an environment of our liking, right? Luckily, our Monarch allows us room just for sparring.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_1_3: Dung, thorns, and flowers... Isn't it more pleasing to the eye than mere whiteness? Our King sure doesn't seem to mind the stench, somehow!
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_2_1: Have you noticed those white blooms as Ze'mer joins the fight? I don't believe to have ever seen a plant so brittle and yet so fast to spread.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_2_2: There is an aura about them I cannot quite place that seems to influence Ze'mer in some form. Maybe it is the reason for the Queen's... no, not distaste, rather... prudence?
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_2_3: Nonetheless, it's a joy to watch greenery grow on a battlefield.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_REPEAT: Let us meet in combat once again!
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_SECOND_DREAM: A fearsome knight it could become, with enough training and time...
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_THIRD_1_1: Another victory for you! I must thank you, for all of us Knights have improved in combat through our duels.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_THIRD_1_2: I expect to see you again soon!
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_THIRD_REPEAT: I expect to see you again soon!
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_THIRD_DREAM: A pale aura, that of the King's...
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_CHARM_1: Ah, you must be wearing Ogrim's brooch! The smell was so indistinguishable from his that I thought it to be my imagination.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_CHARM_2: He must've deemed you worthy to entrust you with such a dear gift and I can see the reason by how valiantly you fought.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_CHARM_3: Take good care of it since I, too, hold it dear. I hope it serves you well.
Reward Room.RR_ISMA_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors on these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_1: Oh, it's you. You may enter.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_2: I have done my best to remain alert since news of that... infection came to us. Though it is a knight's duty to protect the kingdom's citizens, it has been difficult, especially against a peril neither seen nor felt.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_3: Afflicted bugs will attack others without restraint, even those they are familiar with; many do not have the strength to turn their nail against the infected.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_1_4: But I reckon you needn't worry about that, as the King tells us of an emptiness you possess that renders you immune to its effects.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_1: Your combative skills are excellent. I haven't felt so exhilarated in a nail-fight for quite some time. Though Hegemol boasts about his size and blows, his bulk leaves him vulnerable. Don't tell him I ever said that, though.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_2: Isma rather relies on her swiftness to scatter her plants all about, distracting her enemies before striking herself. Ogrim too, seems to be imitating her techniques through his... projectiles.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_3: My style matches yours the most, and yet I couldn't seem to land a decisive strike on you. A challenging opponent for sure, with strength rivalling mine and Ze'mer's.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_2_4: Perhaps you'll surpass all of us, one day. Or might it be too soon to tell?
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_REPEAT: I must focus on my duties now. Perhaps we may speak another time.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_FIRST_DREAM: To love, to care... Are these not needed to save our dear kingdom?
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_1_1: Your well-rounded style is to be envied, formidable for a grub such as yourself. And to perform it not just once, but twice...
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_1_2: I wonder, what will happen when you grow larger? It'd be a shame if you were to lose your mobility with age, however predictable...
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_1_3: Perhaps Ze'mer could teach you how she moves so quickly, despite her stature. None of us could ever properly learn it, but you seem different...
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_1: Sharpening the nail is an art, you know. If you've ever any need to polish that weapon of yours, I'll gladly help.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_2: It seems your nail, too, has been forged from Pale Ore. Mine came from the Kingdom's Crown, where few have ventured before.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_2_ALT: This nail of mine has been forged from pure Pale Ore. It came from the Kingdom's Crown, where few have ventured before.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_3: I'm grateful that I was so easily able to obtain the ore that most nailsmiths are vying for. Mine was but a chunk, brought from the kingdom's peaks. Their mining's hardly done, so I'm sure some traveller would be happy to discover the rest.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_2_3_ALT: I'm grateful that I was so easily able to obtain an ore that most nailsmiths squabble over. There had been more embedded in the stone of the peak, so perhaps it would be of use for your old blade.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_REPEAT: I'll remain on guard for now, then. I'm sure the others have much to say to you.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_SECOND_DREAM: Its nail emanates a royal aura... A master nailsmith must certainly have participated in its creation...
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_1_1: Seems I've met my match in a nail-fight. My offer to sharpen your nail may not even be necessary, should you continue to handle it with that dexterity.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_1_2: I expect I'll see you in the arena soon enough.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_REPEAT: I expect I'll see you in the arena soon enough.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_THIRD_DREAM: My Queen worries... but perhaps it can face the infection unscathed?
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHARM_1: I've noticed your relentless chains of swings in the trial. Our long training seems to have been fruitful and brought you to swift victory.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHARM_2: You have mastered the technique to the point of making it your own. I must laud you for this.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHARM_3: Remember: do not ever let go of the foe once you reach it; if you do not give them a break, they won't be able to fight back.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_OLDNAIL_1: ...Ought I be offended or impressed that you bested me with a nail so worn? Never have I seen an instrument in a state of such disrepair.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_OLDNAIL_2: That weapon is not befitting one of royal lineage. I will speak to the King about finding you a proper nail; one that doesn't look as though it would shatter to pieces with the next strike.
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_OLDNAIL_3: In the meantime, though, perhaps I should polish my own skills...
Reward Room.RR_DRYYA_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors on these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_1_1: I would never have guessed such a small bug could possess strength as mighty as yours. You've surprised me, little one.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_1_2: When I first saw you, I thought I'd have been able to strike you down with my mighty mace like a nailsmith strikes the anvil, but I couldn't have been more pleasantly surprised.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_1_3: This reminds me of a time I was training with Isma, ready to charge through the foliage she had created... She summoned a vine that tripped me over and has never let me forget it since.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_2_1: I do admire your skill with that nail. I could never be so delicate as to handle one without breaking it.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_2_2: Were I to wield a similar weapon, it would be Ze'mer's. What the smiths of her home must be capable of to produce such a massive, yet refined blade...
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_2_3: Of course, nothing suits me better than my trusty mace. No need to be precise if your position doesn't call for it, and there's nothing quite like the joy of smashing your way through everything in your path.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_2_4: If I weren't a Knight, perhaps I would make a good mining golem, oho!
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_REPEAT: I suppose you will be seeing my mace on the battlefield again soon.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_FIRST_DREAM: My jest returns only silence... You are a strange one little knight...
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_1_1: I'm thoroughly impressed; you've withstood my full force and lived to tell the tale twice now. I'm often called ."Mighty." Hegemol, but perhaps I ought to pass that title to you.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_1_2: ...Ho, I only jest. Titles are reserved for us Knights, though I'm sure you are more than capable of joining our ranks. Train with us a bit longer, and the King will no doubt grant you the privilege.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_1_3: ...Of course, of course, I know. You've another role to fulfil. But we've a while before you are ready to take on that task. I'd love to fight alongside you, some day, in true combat.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_1_4: I believe the Battle of the Blackwyrm and Steelcrest Siege would have both been finished far sooner had you been there with us!
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_2_1: If you ever grow larger, you ought to try out a heftier weapon, such as a mace or one akin to Ze'mer's choice. It may not be what you're used to, but it is capable of delivering far more powerful blows than a nail. Er- don't tell Dryya I said that.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_2_2: Oh, and Ogrim's weapon of choice... It sure has knocked more than one unconscious before even hitting! Ho ho! Isma is quite the thorned vine in the battlefield, but her talents truly bloom when helping others.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_2_3: Us Knights have quite the unusual fighting methods, don't we? Although I ought to watch what I say before I start us squabbling, ho ho!
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_REPEAT: You are joyous to fight, little knight.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_SECOND_DREAM: A strange set of warriors we would be, were it to join our ranks...
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_THIRD_1_1: Truly, I admire your strength and grace. Many times now have we met in battle, and many times have I lost thoroughly.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_THIRD_1_2: You hardly even show any sense of fatigue! An impressive feat of resilience and determination that all aspire to achieve, yet few ever obtain.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_THIRD_REPEAT: I shall surely be seeing more of you, little one!
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_THIRD_DREAM: What the King must have done to produce its resilient nature...
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_CHARM_1: Those curious spells! The King really taught you well to be capable of such casts, summoning effective weapons from mere soul.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_CHARM_2: You almost made me question my coldness towards spell crafting; yet I stick to my ways, I much prefer the simplicity of a nice, hefty swing to punish my enemies.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_CHARM_3: While impressive, be cautious of their usage! You've seen the effects in a safe environment so avoid exposing possible bystanders to them.
Reward Room.RR_HEGEMOL_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors on these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_1_1: Ahhhh, Le'mer! Che's nail-play could not match your prowess. A strength seldom met, in this old kingdom.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_1_2: Perfect parries, a swift strike, and che' had fallen before knowing. Not my comrades before che' nor che's blade "Stout" changed the fair-earned outcome.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_1_3: Le'mer, your feats deserve immortalisation in prose. Allow che' to weave such a tale.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_2_1: A lecture at start, a trial at last; Dung and Vine, Nail then Mace, so close they all fell and so fast Stout appeared before the pale face.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_2_2: Che', last knight on line, was looked upon with so firm its gaze as the grip, its nail clashing che's Stout, promising strength unmatching its petite shape.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_2_3: No swing and blow, nor storm and dash would deter its resolve, as che', final kneeling, was looked upon with same unfearful gaze.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_2_4: It won to become one stronger. They won to forge one stronger.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_REPEAT: A tale hastily crafted, but che' hopes you enjoy it nonetheless.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_FIRST_DREAM: Perhaps it might enjoy one of che's other stories sometime...?
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_1_1: Le'mer, does che's bloom catch your curiosity? To many before it did. The petals are of different whiteness, unlike any other from the Queen's branches.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_1_2: Nahlo, Nahlo, none could match this one, grown only in che's homeland. Its stem is of a fragile quality, little needed to deter its shape.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_1_3: But what beauty! Unique than rare, a bloom of utmost value, of meticulous care deserving, of dearest meaning attached.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_1_4: And of so many blossoms in her gardens, reluctant the Queen's roots are towards che' petals. Che' wonders why, as che' shudders living without such beauty, moina?
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_2_1: Me'hon, a tale to tell. One of love, that which the heart aches for.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_2_2: A mantis, of the great tribe shrouded in spores. Che' was but escorting the King when che' caught a glance, yet that an ephemeral moment was enough.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_2_3: Meled'lover, che' but wishes to see such beauty, such grace once again. Nahlo, che' must.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_SECOND_REPEAT: Che' hopes to see her again soon...
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_THIRD_1_1: The cycle continues, confirming you worthy. Wai, che' wishes it to be friendly spar and not urgent lecture.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_THIRD_1_2: But a perilous world expects us to fight for life. So long as che' may use che's skills to protect Meled'lover, combat will be part of che's life still.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_THIRD_1_3: Le'mer would appreciate some lessons from che', moina?
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_THIRD_REPEAT: Strength is a gift not many possess. Che' may help you train it.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_THIRD_DREAM: Could it end the ruin the light threatens to bring...?
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_CHARM_1: ...Ah, che's seen spell practice served you well; you focused as our Monarch instructed you, the soul repelling the offender in perfect flow.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_CHARM_2: Yet che' could sense a silent cry from its use, uneasiness while concentrating. Is it of scary duties, longing home...?
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_CHARM_3: ...Ah, che's apologies for digressing. Me'hon, che' hopes Le'mer can use it for good. Use the cast very wisely.
Reward Room.RR_ZEMER_CHEATER: Begone! We don't tolerate cheaters or save editors on these grounds. That, or you're using the placeholder NPC.

Achievements.ISMA_ACH_DESC: Derrota a Isma en su Arboleda.
Achievements.DRYYA_ACH_DESC: Derrota a Dryya en el jardín de su Reina.
Achievements.HEG_ACH_DESC: Derrota a Hegemol en la Ciudad bulliciosa.
Achievements.ZEM_ACH_DESC: Derrota a Ze'mer en su mansión secreta.
Achievements.PANTH_ACH_DESC: Desafía a la Corte Pálida y toma tu lugar en ella.

CP3.ISMA_LOCKED_DESC: Yazco en una frondosa arboleda, protegida por mi amado
CP3.DRYYA_LOCKED_DESC: Defiendo la verdadera realeza de las garras de traidores
CP3.HEG_LOCKED_DESC: Vigilo las puertas de la capital
CP3.ZEM_LOCKED_DESC: Mi hoja descansa entre tumbas escondidas y sueños

Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_1: ¡Hola de nuevo! Siento no poder saludarte como es debido en estos momentos, pero no quiero interrumpir a mi compañero.
Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_2: Hemos terminado las esculturas de los Cinco Grandes Caballeros y estoy muy contento con el resultado. Mi compañero quería hacer algo más y por eso he acabado en esta postura.
Minor NPC.SHEO_PC_3: Es una sensación nueva esto de ser modelo de escultura y no escultor. ¡Me está gustando!
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_1: Ah, así que has vuelto. ¡Y en el momento perfecto! Los modelos quedaron tan bien que me inspiraron a intentar crear una obra más ambiciosa.
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_2: Échale un vistazo a nuestro trabajo. Nos dio el capricho de esculpir una para ti también. Aunque seas de estatura pequeña, encajas perfectamente.
Minor NPC.SMITH_PC_3: Ahora que terminamos de elaborar a los Caballeros del reino, mis garras ansían capturar algo más...
Minor NPC.WL_KH_1: Ese olor... ¿Hay alguien contigo? ¿Sois vosotros, Ogrim, Isma, mis poderosos Caballeros? Vuestro aroma es más potente cuando estáis juntos.<page>Lealtad y bondad: cualidades valiosas que se han perdido en estos tiempos difíciles. Seguro que lo habéis visto en vuestra travesía a este lugar de espinas descuidadas e intrusos cegados.<page>¿Es por eso que estáis tan callados? Isma, sin duda entiendes el pésimo estado de una vegetación bajo tal sufrimiento, agravado aún por la responsabilidad y el arrepentimiento.<page>Tu presencia es un gran alivio para mi cuerpo marchito, evocando preciosos recuerdos de un tiempo pasado. Agradezco vuestra visita.
Minor NPC.WL_KH_2: A la vuelta, si no lo habéis hecho ya, hacedme el favor de decirle adiós a Dryya.<page>Por muy vulgar que te haya parecido, Isma, sé que os tiene en gran estima como al resto de Caballeros. Estoy segura de que Ogrim lo sabe.
Minor NPC.WL_MP_1: Has vuelto por fin, Dryya. Descansa, por favor, y deja que me ocupe de tus heridas. Tu señora todavía se vale por sí misma.<page>No protestes, no te sientas intimidada. Mis raíces no notan ya peligro, te aseguro que el señor de los traidores se ha ido.<page>Oí la intrépida batalla encima de aquí, luego solo quedó el silencio. Victoriosa y vigilante, ¿no es así, Dryya?<page>Lo has hecho muy, muy bien, mi caballera. Respira y siéntate conmigo un rato. Me ocuparé del resto, si es necesario.
Minor NPC.WL_MP_2: Te apremiaría a sentarte, pero no puedo desafiar tu voluntad. Haz lo que quieras, no te juzgaré. Opino que este refugio debe ser tuyo también.<page>Que tu mente sea aguda y tu aguijón veloz. Ten cuidado.
Minor NPC.WL_BH_1: No voy a preguntar cómo has entrado en esta sala con tu descomunal tamaño. Sin embargo, siento tu presencia con claridad, mi caballero Hegemol.<page>Si el motivo de tu visita es informarme del incesante peligro, soy consciente. Mis raíces sienten cómo la plaga se extiende de nuevo. No poseo el poder de evitar su proliferación.<page>Me alegra que hayas venido, ya que me he atado en esta posición. No me daba cuenta de que echaba en falta tu presencia. Aunque más apagada, tu voz sigue aquí.<page>A ti te confío a los ciudadanos y su futuro. Mantén la ciudad protegida bajo tu sombra. Haz lo que debas.
Minor NPC.WL_BH_2: Antes de irte, tengo una última tarea: dile a Dryya que descanse.<page>Lleva cumpliendo con sus obligaciones mucho tiempo y nunca se ha dado un descanso lejos de los infectados. Seguro que seguirá el consejo de un querido amigo.
Minor NPC.WL_VL_1: Así que fue tu lamento el que percibieron mis raíces... Aunque estés envuelta en tristeza, me alivia sentirte de nuevo, mi caballera Ze'mer.<page>Ninguna flor tuya puedo notar. ¿Se la has llevado a tu amada caída? Su tumba debe estar bien cuidada.<page>¿Qué te trae a este refugio? Por supuesto habrás visto el campo de batalla sobre nosotras. Cuerpos acumulados en los arbustos.<page>No puedo hacer nada por consolar tu gran pérdida, pero no rechazaré tu deseo si quieres pasar un tiempo conmigo.
Minor NPC.WL_VL_2: Agradezco tu presencia . Aunque sea breve, nadie habría previsto esta visita.<page>Dryya sigue en posición a la entrada, así que no encontrarás enemigos cuando te marches de este refugio. Eso sí, no bajes la guardia en los jardines.
Minor NPC.WL_ALL_1: ¿Es esto real...? Tantos visitantes, pero tanto vacío alrededor. ¿Están mis brotes distorsionando la percepción de mi entorno? ¿O habéis sido siempre tan diminutos?<page>Debéis comprender mi escepticismo, mis Cinco queridos. Solo soy capaz de ver a través de otros medios, y estos no podrían haber presagiado la reunión de los Grandes Caballeros en estos tiempos difíciles. Si no fuese porque noto vuestra tenue presencia, creería haber perdido la cabeza por completo.<page>Vuestra llegada me trae recuerdos de tiempos felices, desde relatos legendarios a patrullas ordinarias... Sin duda añoráis esos momentos, como lo hacen los insectos que todavía sobreviven. Yo también los extraño.<page>Incluso aunque permanezcáis callados, me alivia saber que seguís realizando vuestro deber a pesar de la presión. Este reino tiene suerte de tener unos protectores como vosotros.
Minor NPC.WL_ALL_2: Is your silence caused by my presence? Be aware no duty obligates you to stay, for I have no title. If you prefer to leave and discuss with the others, do so with no need of my order.<page>Either way, you're always welcome here. I won't disturb your reunion or rest.

Zote.SHEO_DREAM: Estar aquí con él..., es reconfortante...
Zote.SMITH_DREAM: Nada importa..., siempre que no esté solo...

Speech.ISMA_DESC: Diosa amable del musgo y la arboleda
Speech.DD_ISMA_DESC: Dioses leales defensores del honor y el afecto
Speech.DRYYA_DESC: Diosa protectora de la raíz y del rey
Speech.HEG_DESC: Dios inamovible del corazón del reino
Speech.ZEM2_DESC: Diosa extraña de una tierra sagrada
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_1: Dryya... A pesar de tu apariencia estoica, esa lealtad por nuestra reina... Tu preocupación era sincera, ¿verdad...?
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_2: Hegemol... A pesar de tu robusto caparazón y tu nombre grandioso, tu voz resonaba con dulzura...
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_3: Ze'mer... A pesar de tu habilidad y tu fuerza, solo querías dejar tu aguijón, ¿verdad...?
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_4: Oh, Ogrim... Si hubiésemos tenido más tiempo...
Speech.ISMA_OUTRO_5: Qué placer volverte a ver, pequeño caballero. Debes saber que por muy ocupado y distante que fuese, nuestro monarca siempre se preocupó por ti. Quizá algún día te lo demuestre...
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_1: Hegemol... ¿Sigues vigilando, leal como siempre, a los ciudadanos de la capital...?
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_2: Ogrim, Isma... ¿Encontrasteis fuerza entre vosotros o fue debilidad...?
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_3: Ze'mer... Dejar tu aguijón, no a pesar de tu voluntad, sino gracias a ella...
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_4: Mi reina... ¿Por qué nos escondemos cuando más nos necesitan? ¿Qué hay de tus súbditos?
Speech.DRYYA_OUTRO_5: Qué alegría encontrarnos de nuevo, pequeño caballero. La dignidad con la que te comportas solo la he visto en nuestro rey. Puede que algún día la familia real vuelva a estar unida y tú te unas a nosotros como un igual.
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_1: Ogrim... Después de todo lo que ha pasado, ¿todavía tienes esperanzas...?
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_2: Isma... ¿Son tus enredaderas tan fuertes como las recuerdo? Cuídate y cuida de Ogrim, por favor...
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_3: Dryya... Protégete a ti y a la reina a toda costa. No sé cuánto tiempo aguantaré aquí...
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_4: Ze'mer... No dejes que la tristeza te consuma, ni siquiera después de tu gran pérdida.
Speech.HEG_OUTRO_5: Oh, así que nos volvemos a ver, pequeñín. Mi fortaleza se desvanece, pero el rey y nosotros te hemos enseñado a aguantar... Haz lo que debas, por favor. Lo que sea por salvar Hallownest.
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_1: Ogrim... ¿Por qué continúas con tu deber incansable? ¿Solo por un reino moribundo?
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_2: Isma... ¿Descansas en paz en tu arboleda tan querida?
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_3: Dryya... ¿Todavía proteges contra largas espinas y feroces garras? ¿Soltarás algún día tu hoja?
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_4: Hegemol... ¿Sufres todavía a través de lágrimas incesantes? Che' tiene la esperanza de que descanses también..., algún día...
Speech.ZEM_OUTRO_5: Ulll, Le'mer, verte regresar. Tanto dolor en tan breve tiempo terminó con la voluntad de nuestro monarca, ¿pero Le'mer? En Le'mer se percibe una extraña fuerza, el deber de toda una vida. Meled'amor, espérame...
Speech.CC_OUTRO_1a: Receptáculo, tu entrenamiento será un gran servicio para nuestro querido reino Hallownest. Receptáculo, encadena a la enemiga sin forma en sus sueños.
Speech.CC_OUTRO_1b: Tal sacrificio será conocido por todo Hallownest. Campeón de la Corte, eres el receptáculo. Eres el Hollow Knight.
Speech.RCC_OUTRO_1a: Guau, acabaste la Llamada del Campeón sin recibir daño

Enemy Dreams.FK_ARMOUR_DREAM_PC: El blasón... La puerta de la ciudad...
Enemy Dreams.OGRIM_GG_DREAM_1: Mi rey... Creo en vos. ¡Creo en Hallownest!
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_DREAM_2: Entrar en mi arboleda y superar el ácido corrosivo...
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_DREAM_3: Ogrim... Ojalá pudiésemos quedarnos un rato entrenando aquí...
Enemy Dreams.ISMA_GG_DREAM_2: Eres fuerte, ¡pero mis plantas lo son más!
Enemy Dreams.DRYYA_DREAM_3: Un intruso distinto a los otros...
Enemy Dreams.HEG_DREAM_1: ¿Cómo se protege de una plaga de la mente...?
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_DREAM_3: Nemeno... Aguijones y garras... ¿Por qué tiene que ser así?
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_GG_DREAM_3: Quizá tarde o temprano Nous descansaremos...
Enemy Dreams.ZEM_CC_DREAM_1: ¡Enséñale a che' que Le'mer puede soportar esta carga!
Enemy Dreams.TISO_DREAM_1: Así que está dispuesto a desafiarme...

UI.CHARM_DESC_PURITY:
Al Receptáculo se le otorgó un Aguijón puro forjado por métodos arcanos como un reflejo de sí mismo. Este amuleto personifica el eco de aquella artesanía arcaica.

Mantén ATACAR para concentrarte y blandir la espada frenéticamente. Aumenta de forma gradual la velocidad de ataque del portador a medida que asesta golpes sucesivamente.
UI.CHARM_DESC_LAMENT:
Contiene las adversidades e injusticias que se le impusieron al Receptáculo encadenado. La energía se filtra desesperada por salir de las ataduras.

Al concentrar retuerce el ALMA de los enemigos marcados por el aguijón y libera devastadoras descargas de energía sobre ellos.
UI.CHARM_DESC_BOON:
La guía del Pálido Wyrm brilla con fuerza en este amuleto. La bendición conferida a la tierra conocida como Hallownest logró elevar a los insectos inferiores que residían en su dominio.

Transforma todos los hechizos para que adquieran una apariencia purificada.
UI.CHARM_DESC_BLOOM:
Una flor oscura que fue maldecida para contener un poder incontrolable. Aunque la oscuridad interior esté comprimida, se retuerce de manera volátil, amenazando con liberarse.

El portador obtiene un poder abrumador cuando está cercano a la muerte.
UI.CHARM_DESC_HONOUR:
Un amuleto único otorgado por el rey a su Caballero más leal. Renovado y restaurado a su estado original.

Rodea al portador en un aura real y heroica.

Prompts.CHARM_DESC_PURITY:
Al Receptáculo se le otorgó un Aguijón puro forjado por métodos arcanos como un reflejo de sí mismo. Este amuleto personifica el eco de aquella artesanía arcaica.

Mantén ATACAR para concentrarte y blandir la espada frenéticamente. Aumenta de forma gradual la velocidad de ataque del portador a medida que asesta golpes sucesivamente.
Prompts.CHARM_DESC_LAMENT:
Contiene las adversidades e injusticias que se le impusieron al Receptáculo encadenado. La energía se filtra desesperada por salir de las ataduras.

Al concentrar retuerce el ALMA de los enemigos marcados por el aguijón y libera devastadoras descargas de energía sobre ellos.
